name: azurecosmosdbensuredatabase
description: Ensures that an Azure CosmosDB Database exists or creates a new Database
author: Allan Hardy

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the Azure CosmosDB Account.

inputs.name: DatabaseName
inputs.label: CosmosDB Database name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the name of the CosmosDB to create.

inputs.name: CollectionName
inputs.label: CosmosDB Database Collection name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the name of the CosmosDB database collection to create.

inputs.name: CollectionPartitionKey
inputs.label: CosmosDB Database Collection partition key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the name of the CosmosDB database collection partition key.

inputs.name: CollectionRUs
inputs.label: CosmosDB Database Collection RUs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the name of the CosmosDB database collection RUs.
